Introduction
This topic contains information about the purpose and elements of IDES, including
purpose of IDES
medical evaluation boards (MEBs)
physical evaluation boards (PEBs)
Physical Evaluation Board Liaison Officers (PEBLOs)
MSCs
regional office (RO) points of contact
Disability Rating Activity Sites (DRASs)
Veterans Tracking Application (VTA)
IDES stages of responsibility
, and
timeliness goals of the IDES program
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section E - Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES), Referrals, and Initial Processing
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section E
